verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:1
verses.text: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour, and Lord Jesus Christ, which is our hope;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:2
verses.text: Unto Timothy, my own son in the faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:3
verses.text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus, when I went into Macedonia, that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine,

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:4
verses.text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies, which minister questions, rather than godly edifying which is in faith: so do.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:5
verses.text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart, and of a good conscience, and of faith unfeigned:

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:6
verses.text: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:7
verses.text: Desiring to be teachers of the law; understanding neither what they say, nor whereof they affirm.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:8
verses.text: But we know that the law is good, if a man use it lawfully;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:9
verses.text: Knowing this, that the law is not made for a righteous man, but for the lawless and disobedient, for the ungodly and for sinners, for unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers,

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:10
verses.text: For whoremongers, for them that defile themselves with mankind, for menstealers, for liars, for perjured persons, and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:11
verses.text: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God, which was committed to my trust.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:12
verses.text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord, who hath enabled me, for that he counted me faithful, putting me into the ministry;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:13
verses.text: Who was before a blasphemer, and a persecutor, and injurious: but I obtained mercy, because I did it ignorantly in unbelief.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:14
verses.text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:15
verses.text: This is a faithful saying, and worthy of all acceptation, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am chief.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:16
verses.text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering, for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:17
verses.text: Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only wise God, be honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:18
verses.text: This charge I commit unto thee, son Timothy, according to the prophecies which went before on thee, that thou by them mightest war a good warfare;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:19
verses.text: Holding faith, and a good conscience; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck:

verses.name: 1 Timothy 1:20
verses.text: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander; whom I have delivered unto Satan, that they may learn not to blaspheme.
